title: 启动器崩溃错误报告BMCL求解
author: MC_Little_T
txt_content:
本人是一名实习程序员minecraft中的错误报告我都可以看懂但是自从我的windows升级为windows7之后minecraft就开启不了了错无报告如下
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Ouch. That hurt :(
Time: 15-10-4 下午4:47
Description: Initializing game
org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:247)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:306)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:848)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:757)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:739)
 at bab.am(SourceFile:578)
 at bab.ak(SourceFile:417)
 at bab.a(SourceFile:364)
 at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:125)

A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Head --
Stacktrace:
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)

 at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:848)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:757)
 at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:739)
 at bab.am(SourceFile:578)
 at bab.ak(SourceFile:417)
-- Initialization --
Details:
Stacktrace:
 at bab.a(SourceFile:364)
 at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:125)
-- System Details --
Details:
 Minecraft Version: 15w41b
 Operating System: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
 Java Version: 1.7.0_51, Oracle Corporation
 Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
 Memory: 16235072 bytes (15 MB) / 60645376 bytes (57 MB) up to 523501568 bytes (499 MB)
 JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xincgc -Xmx512M
 IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
 Launched Version: 15w41b
 LWJGL: 2.9.4
 OpenGL: ~~ERROR~~ RuntimeException: No OpenGL context found in the current thread.
 GL Caps: 
 Using VBOs: No
 Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.
 Type: Client (map_client.txt)
 Resource Packs: 
 Current Language: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null
 Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
 CPU: <unknown>
大神求解
简介：JAVA7、JAVA8都启动不了
java路径：C:\Program Files(X86)\java\jre7\bin\javaw.exe

replies.author: 矿工zhanghua
replies.txt_content:
LZ装的Java必须是32位的
是不是装了64位的？

replies.author: MC_Little_T
replies.txt_content:
矿工zhanghua 发表于 2015-10-11 14:27
LZ装的Java必须是32位的
是不是装了64位的？
电脑是64的，我就安的是64的，安32的你却定会不出现大量bug？
